page.title: 12LOCAL HISTORY 2
page.content: 5{Maritime Streets. Matthew Street. This street is named after Matthew Beveridge who was Box Master for the Prime Guilt Box for over 30 years. 6{Notable Citizens Street.} Alison Street. This street was named after Alison Young, daughter of the owner of the pottery in the Links area of the town. 7{Self-Defined Streets.} Bennochy Road. (a) From the Gaelic "beannach". Bean is a hill or ben. (b) The name Bennochy means the place where the saint gave his blessing. St Bryce - the patron saint of Kirkcaldy.
